thread.title: Snow in New York but warm welcome
thread.title_full: Snow in New York but warm welcome - Review of Roger Smith Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: henrietta007
title: Snow in New York but warm welcome
text: I attended the CSW at the UN Offices in New York. The Roger Smith Hotel is within walking distance from there, as well as restaurants and shops. The staff was very friendly and helpful. Even as the snow kept many workers away from their jobs, the rooms were still serviced. Rooms are spacious, clean and welcoming.
